snippet: The Senate minority leader, Mitch McConnell, and the House minority leader, Nancy Pelosi, are among the members of Congress who join the Sunday shows this week to weigh in on whether the new Congress can break the gridlock.
abstract: The Senate minority leader, Mitch McConnell, and the House minority leader, Nancy Pelosi, are among the members of Congress who join the Sunday shows this week to weigh in on whether the new Congress can break the gridlock.
